parameter.value: Goodbye. Feel free to come again when you want to talk.
As you can see I am a ruler of this city. My status was my choice. I came here to {promote} new Enigma elite citizens.
If you need help ask Alice. She is a guide. Otherwise tell me on what topic I am supposed to help you.
She is good girl and my faithful student. She helped many people. Great future is coming for her.
Future ruler of Enigma must be worth her status. I'm testing my subjects to make sure they are ready.
As you can see I am a ruler of this city. My status was my choice. I came here to {promote} new Enigma elite citizens.
For becoming a princess, of course. They have to pass such a long, long way.

Thousand years ago, when people were fighting each other Enigma City was a place full of peace, but we had to hide from external world. We used massive invisibility spells to cover our city and protect our subjects. This is where its name came from.
If you need someone who knows {Enigma} City ask my faithful student {Alice} for help. I bet you met her before.
The world is still in conflict. Enigma is safest place so far.
I am here to protect my subjects as last line of defense in worst cases.
See that building on the left? This is where my clothes came from.
Our army as well as royal guardian positions are taken. There is no free place so far.
I don't have any missions for you so far.
